name: Breville+
0:
”Alexa, open Joule Oven.”
”Alexa, ask Joule Oven for a status update.”
”Alexa, set the oven to bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: joule oven
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Interact with your Breville appliances via voice. Set the appliance mode, temperature, time or even find out when your food will be done. It works in tandem with the mobile app to help you get better results and better cooking experience. Supported modes include Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Dehydrate, Proof, Reheat, Roast, Slow Cook, Warm and Sous Vide.

To use this skill, you'll need:
1) A connected appliance (the Joule Oven Air Fryer Pro, Joule Sous Vide, etc)
2) Download the Breville Joule App (iOS/Android)
3) Follow the pairing instructions
4) Click on the "Account" icon and click on Tips. Then click Use Alexa to control your oven.
5) Follow the instructions to link the skill
